Package Class

Class Order

java.lang.Object
Class.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents a room service order.
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mary Soh

    • Order

      public Order(LocalTime timeOrdered, LocalDate dateOrdered, StatusOrder status, String roomNumber)
      Creates a new Order with the given time, date, status and room number.
      Parameters:
      timeOrdered - The time that the order was created.
      dateOrdered - The date that the order was created.
      status - The status of the order.
      roomNumber - The room number that this order belongs to.

      public void addOrderItem(String name, String foodRemark, int quantity, double price)
      Adds an item into this Order using the name of the menu item, remarks, quantity and price.

      name - name of the menu item.
      foodRemark - remarks for this order item.
      quantity - quantity of this order item.
      price - price of this order item.

    • updateOrderItemRemarks

      public void updateOrderItemRemarks(int foodIndex, String remarks)
      Changes the remarks of a specific order item.
      Parameters:
      foodIndex - the index of the order item in the ArrayList of order items to be changed.
      remarks - the new remarks of the order item.
